tool_description: Modifies medication dosages and provides safety guidance for patients with liver dysfunction.

liver_function_grade.description: Liver function: normal, child_pugh_a, child_pugh_b, child_pugh_c

hepatic_enzymes.description: Recent liver enzyme values [ALT, AST, Bilirubin]

error_messages: Invalid liver function grade: Use one of [normal, child_pugh_a, child_pugh_b, child_pugh_c].
Drug not metabolized hepatically: This medication does not require hepatic dose adjustment.
Invalid enzyme values: Liver enzyme values must be positive numbers.
Contraindicated in liver disease: This medication is contraindicated in current level of liver dysfunction.
usage: Provide drug_name, standard_dose, and liver_function_grade. Optionally include hepatic_enzymes for more precise adjustment calculations.
